Name: Encounter of Galaxies
About the game: Encounter of Galaxies is a vertical scrolling shooter with an open world and elements of trade. Improve your ship by buying parts. Trade with allied and neutral planets. Destroy enemy ships, thereby weakening enemy military power. Once scientists were able to create a hyper transition between objects with high gravity over long distances. Then, on the basis of this technology, the first hyperdrive engines were developed, which make it possible to lay hyper-transitions between the stars. People colonized the entire galaxy, but still could not reach out to the others. Improving technology and expecting the approach of the neighboring galaxy, humanity was preparing to implement the first intergalactic hyper jump. But not only humanity was prepared for this. Hiverion - a civilization from a neighboring galaxy, possessing a collective intelligence, proved to be faster. Taking advantage of the development of its hyperdrives, she attacked one planet after another, remaining unreachable for retaliation. Will mankind get to the galaxy of Hiverion, find and destroy its main ship, before it is captured depends on you. Features A randomly generated open world, numbering up to 500 stars and planets. The ever-changing military and economic situation. The ship consists of separate parts, each of which can be destroyed separately. The lowest prices for fuel :)
